HipsLyingHipExternalRotator.name: Lying Hip External Rotator Stretch
HipsLyingHipExternalRotator.preparation: Lie on floor or mat and with one leg straight and other leg bent approximately 90 degrees out to side.
HipsLyingHipExternalRotator.execution: Lower bent knee beside straight leg. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.
HipsLyingHipExternalRotator.comments: Body may be reclined with support of arms as demonstrated (lower right). Also see Seated External Rotator Stretch.

HipsSeatedHipExternalRotator.name: Seated Hip External Rotator Stretch
HipsSeatedHipExternalRotator.preparation: Sit on floor or mat and with one leg straight and other leg bent approximately 90 degrees out to side.
HipsSeatedHipExternalRotator.execution: Lower bent knee beside straight leg. Hold stretch. Repeat with opposite side.
HipsSeatedHipExternalRotator.comments: Also see Lying External Rotator Stretch.
